summary.span: 定义自定义请求验证的基方法。

span.span: Defines base methods for custom request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，ASP.NET 不会验证请求，直到代码显式请求请求中的值。By default, ASP.NET does not validate requests until code explicitly requests a value from the request. 例如，在代码访问集合之前，ASP.NET 不会验证查询字符串值 。For example, ASP.NET does not validate query-string values until code accesses the collection. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 也不会验证某些类型的请求数据，如窗体值、cookie、使用 HTTP 上传的文件的名称以及属性的值 。By default, ASP.NET also does not validate some types of request data, such as form values, cookies, the names of files that have been uploaded using HTTP, and the value of the property. 类是一个基类，可以实现此基类以提供自定义请求验证。The class is a base class that you can implement in order to provide custom request validation. 通过实现此类，可以确定验证发生的时间以及要对其执行验证的请求数据的类型。By implementing this class, you can determine when validation occurs and what type of request data to perform validation on. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 提供跨站点脚本 (XSS) 检查。By default, ASP.NET provides cross-site scripting (XSS) checks. 但是，可以通过创建 XSS 的自定义实现来补充或替换 ASP.NET 中提供的请求验证逻辑。However, you can supplement or replace the request validation logic that is provided in ASP.NET by creating a custom implementation of the XSS. 例如，你可以编写一个自定义请求验证实现，该实现除了检查 XSS 攻击以外，还会扫描 SQL 注入攻击。For example, you can write a custom request validation implementation that scans for SQL injection attacks in addition to checking for XSS attacks. 若要创建自定义请求验证，请编写一个派生自基类的自定义类 。To create custom request validation, you write a custom class that derives from the base class. 然后，将 ASP.NET 配置为使用应用程序级别 Web.config 文件中的自定义请求验证程序。You then configure ASP.NET to use the custom request validator in the application-level Web.config file. 可以将自定义类放入 App_Code 文件夹、Bin 文件夹中的已编译类库或 GAC 中的已编译类库中。You can put the custom class in the App_Code folder, in a compiled class library in the Bin folder, or in a compiled class library in the GAC. > [!NOTE] > 对于应用程序，只能配置一个自定义请求验证类型。Only one custom request validation type can be configured for an application. 不能为单个虚拟路径或页面配置不同的请求验证类型。It is not possible to configure a different request validation type for individual virtual paths or pages. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义请求验证程序，该验证器仅允许将特定字符串用于查询字符串值。The following example shows how to create a custom request validator that allows only a specific string to be used for query-string values. ASP.NET 不会为每个请求创建新的请求验证程序实例。ASP.NET does not create a new request validator instance per request. 因此，类的自定义实现 必须是线程安全的。Therefore, custom implementations of the class must be thread-safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法可以执行请求数据的自定义验证。You implement this method to perform custom validation of request data. 方法的基本行为 类似于 ASP.NET 在内部实现以检查跨站点脚本验证中的危险字符串的行为。The base behavior of the method is like the behavior that ASP.NET implements internally to check for dangerous strings in cross-site scripting validation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 ASP.NET 中阻止跨站点脚本](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708)。For more information, see [How To: Prevent Cross-Site Scripting in ASP.NET](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708). 如果自定义验证逻辑检测到错误，则此方法应返回， `false` 并在中提供一个值 `validationFailureIndex` 以指示导致错误的文本的起始点。If custom validation logic detects an error, this method should return `false` and provide a value in `validationFailureIndex` to indicate the starting point of the text that caused the error. 中的值 `validationFailureIndex` 必须为0或正整数。The value in `validationFailureIndex` must be 0 or a positive integer. 请求验证检查中的逻辑按如下方式继续：The logic in a request validation check proceeds as follows: - 类对传入数据执行 null 字符删除检查。The class performs a null-character removal check on the incoming data. - 类) 调用方法的 默认实现 (方法，或调用方法的派生版本。The class calls either the method (the default implementation of the base method) or calls a derived version of the method. - 如果 方法返回 `false` 以指示验证失败，ASP.NET 会根据需要构造错误字符串 (如有必要) 并引发 异常。If method returns `false` to indicate a validation failure, ASP.NET constructs an error string (if necessary) and throws an exception.
